title: "Machine learning helps predict new materials for nano alloys, semiconductors, rare earths"
excerpt: "Scientists have used machine learning to develop a design map of alloys at the nano-scale which can help predict the match of pairs of metals that can form bimetallic nano-alloys, a new frontier in the quest of new materials having applications in biomedicine and other areas."
